result.title: Poll
result.content:
How often should National Online Computing Olympiad contests be, for the next several contests?

A) Once every month (12/year)
B) Once every 2 months (6/year)
C) Once every 3 months (4/year)
D) 2-3/year
E) Whenever we feel like it (?/year)
F) your contests suck, stop running them (0/year)
G) Other; please specify
